text: Xu Chongde (15 January 1929 - 3 March 2014) was a Chinese legal expert, professor and political scientist. He was a member of the Communist Party of China in the People's Republic of China. He was born in Qingpu, Shanghai. Xu Chongde died on 3 March 2014 in Beijing. He was 85 years old. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Political scientists Category:Chinese academics Category:Scientists from Shanghai
title: Xu Chongde
